entries.meaning: (uncountable) Construction material supplied in sheets, and made of three or more layers of wood veneer glued together, laid up with alternating layers having their grain perpendicular to each other.
examples: After the hurricane there was a severe regional shortage of plywood, especially exterior plywood.

entries.meaning: (countable) A specific grade or type of this construction material.
examples: We stock exterior plywoods, interior plywoods, and furniture plywoods.

verbs.description: plywood (third-person singular simple present plywoods, present participle plywooding, simple past and past participle plywooded)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To fit or block up with plywood.
